message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll see its worth!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for a product of this quality.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This offer reflects the product's true value.
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $15,000. I hope this aligns better with our interests.
